Author: Qa4646
Text: My parents are the same, dishes everywhere and our dishwasher does not clean our dishes at all and always has food still stuck on them and they don't see it and they eat from those dishes. It makes me so stressed because i hate washing dishes every single time i want to eat something.

Author: ashleynicolle1
Text: My old roommates where like this and blamed me for everything being dirty. I pretty much isolated myself to my room and left the rest of the apt for them to.destroy on their own. And I documented the entire thing. So if they tried to target me with it in court as they were shorty like that they couldn't. I suggest getting out of there as it can get toxic fast.
